===Sets rocket/hornet color and scale.===

= Description =

Sets hornets with 3 different colors and percentage of the hornets you want to give these colors. Also Sets scale of the normal hornets and percentage of the hornets you want to give a custom scale.
==Sets the color of normal hornets.== 
======asw_rocket_color====== 
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 1.3.9 || `255 255 255` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Color255] 
|}

==Sets a second color for hornets.==
======asw_rocket_color2======
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 1.3.9 || `255 255 255` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Color255] 
|}
======asw_rocket_color2_percent======
Sets the percentage of the hornets want to give the second color, sets the value in between 0 - 1. 
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 1.3.9 || `0` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Float] 
|}
